name: Gordon Ramsay
bio: Born in Spain, Chef Manuel Romero was raised in a family that loved cooking traditional and tasty food. When he was a child, his family moved to the United States, and he developed a passion for cooking by watching, helping, and learning alongside his mother. He attended New York Technical College in Brooklyn, New York.
